name: Healthyfied Flourless Takoyaki
description: Dive into the heart of Japanese street food with a healthy twist using this Healthyfied Flourless Takoyaki recipe. Perfect for those following a low-carb and low-sugar diet, these bites are not only tantalizingly delicious but also cater to your health goals. Enjoy the flavors of traditional takoyaki guilt-free!

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the cabbage into fine pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the tomatoes into small cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, beat the egg and then season with salt and ground pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped cabbage and diced tomatoes to the egg mixture and stir until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the takoyaki pan over medium heat and lightly grease with oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the batter into the takoyaki pan holes, filling them three-quarters full. Cook for about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Use a skewer to turn each ball. Continue cooking until the exterior is golden brown and crispy, about 5 more minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the flourless takoyaki hot, garnished with your favorite healthy toppings.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
